content: Terminology servers and services have been discussed quite a bit in our group. People might be interested in this meetup: https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev/events/283896728/?response=3&action=rsvp
Probably also relevant for @Thea Mentz Soerensen / @Ole Vilstrup
I'm joining too - and passed the invitation to some of coworkers planning terminology services for SNOMED CT++.
